d1e17.d: Moon landing conspiracy theories suggest that the Apollo missions that landed humans on the Moon were faked.

d1e24.d: There have been six crewed moon landings, all part of NASA's Apollo program.

d1e31.d: Since the last manned moon landing in 1972, countries have used unmanned space craft to explore landing sites for future manned landings and to search for natural resources.

d1e39.d: NASA researchers have confirmed that water exists both in the sunlit and shadowed surfaces of the Moon.

d1e46.d: There have been six successful manned moon landings.

d1e53.t: Methods to locate water on the moon
d1e53.d: Scientists use a variety of methods to detect water on the Moon.

d1e60.d: A moon landing refers to the event when a spacecraft successfully lands on the surface of the Moon.

d1e67.t: How do we locate moon water using radar?
d1e67.d: Ground-penetrating radar (GPR) is a powerful tool for detecting water on the Moon.
